text:
labfolder | Frontend (senior 5+ Javascript)[1], Backend (Java)[2] | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE | labfolder.com

-------------

labfolder [3] aims to be the central repository for all laboratory research data. We currently develop an electronic lab notebook (ELN) for scientists which redefines the traditional paper lab notebook as a productivity & collaboration platform. We make it easier for research teams to create, find, share, discuss and validate their findings.

-------------

[1] https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/LabfolderGmbH/7439996782541...

[2] https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/LabfolderGmbH/7439996758016...

[3] https://www.labfolder.com/
